verses.verse: Now it came<WH1961> about when Adoni-zedek king<WH4428> of Jerusalem<WH3389> heard<WH8085> that Joshua<WH3091> had captured<WH3920> Ai,<WH5857> and had utterly<WH2763> destroyed<WH2763> it (just<WH9201> as he had done<WH6213> to Jericho<WH3405> and its king,<WH4428> so<WH3651> he had done<WH6213> to Ai<WH5857> and its king<WH4428>), and that the inhabitants<WH3427> of Gibeon<WH1391> had made<WH7999> peace<WH7999> with Israel<WH3478> and were within<WH7130> their land,<WH7130>

that he feared<WH3372> greatly,<WH3966> because<WH3588> Gibeon<WH1391> [was] a great<WH1419> city,<WH5892> like one<WH259> of the royal<WH4467> cities,<WH5892> and because<WH3588> it was greater<WH1419> than<WH4480> Ai,<WH5857> and all<WH3605> its men<WH376> [were] mighty.<WH1368>

Therefore Adoni-zedek king<WH4428> of Jerusalem<WH3389> sent<WH7971> [word] to Hoham<WH1944> king<WH4428> of Hebron<WH2275> and to Piram<WH6502> king<WH4428> of Jarmuth<WH3412> and to Japhia<WH3309> king<WH4428> of Lachish<WH3923> and to Debir<WH1688> king<WH4428> of Eglon,<WH5700> saying,<WH559>
"Come<WH5927> up to me and help<WH5826> me, and let us attack<WH5221> Gibeon,<WH1391> for it has made<WH7999> peace<WH7999> with Joshua<WH3091> and with the sons<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>"

So the five<WH2568> kings<WH4428> of the Amorites,<WH567> the king<WH4428> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> the king<WH4428> of Hebron,<WH2275> the king<WH4428> of Jarmuth,<WH3412> the king<WH4428> of Lachish,<WH3923> [and] the king<WH4428> of Eglon,<WH5700> gathered<WH622> together and went<WH5927> up, they with all<WH3605> their armies,<WH4264> and camped<WH2583> by Gibeon<WH1391> and fought<WH3898> against<WH5921> it.

Then the men<WH376> of Gibeon<WH1391> sent<WH7971> [word] to Joshua<WH3091> to the camp<WH4264> at Gilgal,<WH1537> saying,<WH559> "Do not abandon<WH7503> <WH3027> <WH4480> your servants;<WH5650> come<WH5927> up to us quickly<WH4120> and save<WH3467> us and help<WH5826> us, for all<WH3605> the kings<WH4428> of the Amorites<WH567> that live<WH3427> in the hill<WH2022> country<WH2022> have assembled<WH6908> against<WH413> us."
So Joshua<WH3091> went<WH5927> up from Gilgal,<WH1537> he and all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> of war<WH4421> with him and all<WH3605> the valiant<WH2428> warriors.<WH1368>
And the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> to Joshua,<WH3091> "Do not fear<WH3372> them, for I have given<WH5414> them into your hands;<WH3027> not one<WH376> of them shall stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> you."
So Joshua<WH3091> came<WH935> upon them suddenly<WH6597> by marching<WH5927> all<WH3605> night<WH3915> from Gilgal.<WH1537>

And the Lord<WH3068> confounded<WH2000> them before<WH6440> Israel,<WH3478> and He slew<WH5221> them with a great<WH1419> slaughter<WH4347> at Gibeon,<WH1391> and pursued<WH7291> them by the way<WH1870> of the ascent<WH4608> of Beth-horon, and struck<WH5221> them as far<WH5704> as Azekah<WH5825> and Makkedah.<WH4719>

And it came<WH1961> about as they fled<WH5127> from before<WH4480> <WH6440> Israel,<WH3478> [while] they were at the descent<WH4174> of Beth-horon, that the Lord<WH3068> threw<WH7993> large<WH1419> stones<WH68> from heaven<WH8064> on them as far<WH5704> as Azekah,<WH5825> and they died;<WH4191> [there were] more<WH7227> who<WH834> died<WH4191> from the hailstones<WH1259> <WH68> than<WH4480> those whom<WH834> the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> killed<WH2026> with the sword.<WH2719>

Then<WH227> Joshua<WH3091> spoke<WH1696> to the Lord<WH3068> in the day<WH3117> when the Lord<WH3068> delivered<WH5414> up the Amorites<WH567> before<WH6440> the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and he said<WH559> in the sight<WH5869> of Israel,<WH3478> "O sun,<WH8121> stand<WH1826> still<WH1826> at Gibeon,<WH1391> And O moon<WH3394> in the valley<WH6010> of Aijalon.<WH357>"

So the sun<WH8121> stood<WH1826> still,<WH1826> and the moon<WH3394> stopped,<WH5975> Until<WH5704> the nation<WH1471> avenged<WH5358> themselves of their enemies.<WH340> Is it not written<WH3789> in the book<WH5612> of Jashar<WH3477>? And the sun<WH8121> stopped<WH5975> in the middle<WH2677> of the sky,<WH8064> and did not hasten<WH213> to go<WH935> [down] for about a whole<WH8549> day.<WH3117>

And there was no<WH3808> day<WH3117> like that before<WH6440> it or after<WH310> it, when the Lord<WH3068> listened<WH8085> to the voice<WH6963> of a man;<WH376> for the Lord<WH3068> fought<WH3898> for Israel.<WH3478>
Then Joshua<WH3091> and all<WH3605> Israel<WH3478> with him returned<WH7725> to the camp<WH4264> to Gilgal.<WH1537>
Now these<WH428> five<WH2568> kings<WH4428> had fled<WH5127> and hidden<WH2244> themselves in the cave<WH4631> at Makkedah.<WH4719>
And it was told<WH5046> Joshua,<WH3091> saying,<WH559> "The five<WH2568> kings<WH4428> have been found<WH4672> hidden<WH2244> in the cave<WH4631> at Makkedah.<WH4719>"
And Joshua<WH3091> said,<WH559> "Roll<WH1556> large<WH1419> stones<WH68> against<WH413> the mouth<WH6310> of the cave,<WH4631> and assign<WH6485> men<WH376> by it to guard<WH8104> them,

but do not stay<WH5975> [there] yourselves;<WH9043> pursue<WH7291> your enemies<WH340> and attack<WH2179> them in the rear.<WH2179> Do not allow<WH5414> them to enter<WH935> their cities,<WH5892> for the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> has delivered<WH5414> them into your hand.<WH3027> "

And it came<WH1961> about when Joshua<WH3091> and the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> had finished<WH3615> slaying<WH5221> them with a very<WH3966> great<WH1419> slaughter,<WH4347> until<WH5704> they were destroyed,<WH8552> and the survivors<WH8300> [who] remained<WH8277> of them had entered<WH935> the fortified<WH4013> cities,<WH5892>

that all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> returned<WH7725> to the camp<WH4264> to Joshua<WH3091> at Makkedah<WH4719> in peace.<WH7965> No<WH3808> one uttered<WH2782> a word<WH3956> against any of the sons<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>
Then Joshua<WH3091> said,<WH559> "Open<WH6605> the mouth<WH6310> of the cave<WH4631> and bring<WH3318> these<WH428> five<WH2568> kings<WH4428> out to me from the cave.<WH4631>"

And they did<WH6213> so,<WH3651> and brought<WH3318> these<WH428> five<WH2568> kings<WH4428> out to him from the cave:<WH4631> the king<WH4428> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> the king<WH4428> of Hebron,<WH2275> the king<WH4428> of Jarmuth,<WH3412> the king<WH4428> of Lachish,<WH3923> [and] the king<WH4428> of Eglon.<WH5700>

And it came<WH1961> about when they brought<WH3318> these<WH428> kings<WH4428> out to Joshua,<WH3091> that Joshua<WH3091> called<WH7121> for all<WH3605> the men<WH376> of Israel,<WH3478> and said<WH559> to the chiefs<WH7101> of the men<WH376> of war<WH4421> who had gone<WH1980> with him, "Come<WH7126> near,<WH7126> put<WH7760> your feet<WH7272> on the necks<WH6677> of these<WH428> kings.<WH4428>" So they came<WH7126> near<WH7126> and put<WH7760> their feet<WH7272> on their necks.<WH6677>

Joshua<WH3091> then said<WH559> to them, "Do not fear<WH3372> or be dismayed!<WH2865> Be strong<WH2388> and courageous,<WH553> for thus<WH3602> the Lord<WH3068> will do<WH6213> to all<WH3605> your enemies<WH340> with whom<WH834> you fight.<WH3898>"

So afterward<WH310> <WH3651> Joshua<WH3091> struck<WH5221> them and put<WH4191> them to death,<WH4191> and he hanged<WH8518> them on five<WH2568> trees;<WH6086> and they hung<WH8518> on the trees<WH6086> until<WH5704> evening.<WH6153>

And it came<WH1961> about at sunset<WH8121> <WH935> that Joshua<WH3091> commanded,<WH6680> and they took<WH3381> them down<WH3381> from the trees<WH6086> and threw<WH7993> them into the cave<WH4631> where<WH834> <WH8033> they had hidden<WH2244> themselves, and put<WH7760> large<WH1419> stones<WH68> over<WH5921> the mouth<WH6310> of the cave,<WH4631> to this<WH2088> very<WH6106> day.<WH3117>

Now Joshua<WH3091> captured<WH3920> Makkedah<WH4719> on that day,<WH3117> and struck<WH5221> it and its king<WH4428> with the edge<WH6310> of the sword;<WH2719> he utterly<WH2763> destroyed<WH2763> it and every<WH3605> person<WH5315> who<WH834> was in it. He left<WH7604> no<WH3808> survivor.<WH8300> Thus he did<WH6213> to the king<WH4428> of Makkedah<WH4719> just<WH9201> as he had done<WH6213> to the king<WH4428> of Jericho.<WH3405>
Then Joshua<WH3091> and all<WH3605> Israel<WH3478> with him passed<WH5674> on from Makkedah<WH4719> to Libnah,<WH3841> and fought<WH3898> against<WH5973> Libnah.<WH3841>

And the Lord<WH3068> gave<WH5414> it also<WH1571> with its king<WH4428> into the hands<WH3027> of Israel,<WH3478> and he struck<WH5221> it and every<WH3605> person<WH5315> who<WH834> [was] in it with the edge<WH6310> of the sword.<WH2719> He left<WH7604> no<WH3808> survivor<WH8300> in it. Thus he did<WH6213> to its king<WH4428> just<WH9201> as he had done<WH6213> to the king<WH4428> of Jericho.<WH3405>
And Joshua<WH3091> and all<WH3605> Israel<WH3478> with him passed<WH5674> on from Libnah<WH3841> to Lachish,<WH3923> and they camped<WH2583> by it and fought<WH3898> against it.

And the Lord<WH3068> gave<WH5414> Lachish<WH3923> into the hands<WH3027> of Israel;<WH3478> and he captured<WH3920> it on the second<WH8145> day,<WH3117> and struck<WH5221> it and every<WH3605> person<WH5315> who<WH834> [was] in it with the edge<WH6310> of the sword,<WH2719> according to all<WH3605> that he had done<WH6213> to Libnah.<WH3841>

Then<WH227> Horam<WH2036> king<WH4428> of Gezer<WH1507> came<WH5927> up to help<WH5826> Lachish,<WH3923> and Joshua<WH3091> defeated<WH5221> him and his people<WH5971> until<WH5704> he had left<WH7604> him no<WH1115> survivor.<WH8300>
And Joshua<WH3091> and all<WH3605> Israel<WH3478> with him passed<WH5674> on from Lachish<WH3923> to Eglon,<WH5700> and they camped<WH2583> by it and fought<WH3898> against<WH5921> it.

And they captured<WH3920> it on that day<WH3117> and struck<WH5221> it with the edge<WH6310> of the sword;<WH2719> and he utterly<WH2763> destroyed<WH2763> that day<WH3117> every<WH3605> person<WH5315> who<WH834> [was] in it, according to all<WH3605> that he had done<WH6213> to Lachish.<WH3923>
Then Joshua<WH3091> and all<WH3605> Israel<WH3478> with him went<WH5927> up from Eglon<WH5700> to Hebron,<WH2275> and they fought<WH3898> against<WH5921> it.

And they captured<WH3920> it and struck<WH5221> it and its king<WH4428> and all<WH3605> its cities<WH5892> and all<WH3605> the persons<WH5315> who<WH834> [were] in it with the edge<WH6310> of the sword.<WH2719> He left<WH7604> no<WH3808> survivor,<WH8300> according to all<WH3605> that he had done<WH6213> to Eglon.<WH5700> And he utterly<WH2763> destroyed<WH2763> it and every<WH3605> person<WH5315> who<WH834> [was] in it.
Then Joshua<WH3091> and all<WH3605> Israel<WH3478> with him returned<WH7725> to Debir,<WH1688> and they fought<WH3898> against<WH5921> it.

And he captured<WH3920> it and its king<WH4428> and all<WH3605> its cities,<WH5892> and they struck<WH5221> them with the edge<WH6310> of the sword,<WH2719> and utterly<WH2763> destroyed<WH2763> every<WH3605> person<WH5315> [who was] in it. He left<WH7604> no<WH3808> survivor.<WH8300> Just<WH9201> as he had done<WH6213> to Hebron,<WH2275> so<WH3651> he did<WH6213> to Debir<WH1688> and its king,<WH4428> as he had also done<WH6213> to Libnah<WH3841> and its king.<WH4428>

Thus Joshua<WH3091> struck<WH5221> all<WH3605> the land,<WH776> the hill<WH2022> country<WH2022> and the Negev<WH5045> and the lowland<WH8219> and the slopes<WH794> and all<WH3605> their kings.<WH4428> He left<WH7604> no<WH3808> survivor,<WH8300> but he utterly<WH2763> destroyed<WH2763> all<WH3605> who<WH5397> breathed,<WH5397> just<WH9201> as the Lord,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> had commanded.<WH6680>
And Joshua<WH3091> struck<WH5221> them from Kadesh-barnea even as far<WH5704> as Gaza,<WH5804> and all<WH3605> the country<WH776> of Goshen<WH1657> even as far<WH5704> as Gibeon.<WH1391>

And Joshua<WH3091> captured<WH3920> all<WH3605> these<WH428> kings<WH4428> and their lands<WH776> at one<WH259> time,<WH6471> because<WH3588> the Lord,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> fought<WH3898> for Israel.<WH3478>
So Joshua<WH3091> and all<WH3605> Israel<WH3478> with him returned<WH7725> to the camp<WH4264> at Gilgal.<WH1537>
